findings.title: Naming problem reduces code readability
findings.description: The name of this function and return statement could be improved as it implies that it gets/returns a percentage but actually returns an amount of calculated reward tokens

findings.title: Enforce the use of specific Solidity compiler version
findings.description: The code declares `pragma solidity ^0.4.24` which allows any solc compiler greater or equal to 0.4.24 and lower than 0.5.0, but it is recommended to use a specific version without the `^` symbol and add it to dependencies for testing, compiling, and deploying.
